description: some of tests use different method of assertTrue(isinstance(A, B)) or assertEqual(type(A), B). The correct way is to use assertIsInstance(A, B) provided by testtools
title: assertTrue(isinstance()) in tests should be replace with assertIsInstance()

commit 3d03291df88a2a95e0cfb9ae8bb0b7a56ce1b846
Author: wanghong <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jan 15 18:58:33 2014 +0800

    Change assertTrue(isinstance()) by optimal assert
    
    Some of tests use different method of assertTrue(isinstance(A, B)) or
    assertEqual(type(A), B). The correct way is to use assertIsInstance(A, B)
    provided by testtools.
    
    Change-Id: Ia8d38f73c159c7ef943a8f6cfe72b945cc493947
    Closes-bug: #1268480

commit f1c1e3ef17027884db340ecba313993fb6761df1
Author: ZhiQiang Fan <email address hidden>
Date:   Fri Jan 17 18:30:11 2014 +0800

    Replace assertTrue with explicit assertIsInstance
    
    assertIsInstance can provide useful message when test fails,
    this patch replaces assertTrue(isinstance(x, y)) with
    assertIsInstance(x, y).
    
    Change-Id: Ia87b6b8d15f96ce7cf4082fc5ec599ade1d8114e
    Closes-Bug: #1268480

commit 578eecddb3a719b1ea0f9d3b5c9b10016b9e6bb4
Author: LiuNanke <email address hidden>
Date:   Sun Jan 10 03:38:13 2016 +0800

    Replace assertTrue(isinstance()) with assertIsInstance()
    
    Some of tests use different method of assertTrue(isinstance(A, B)) or
    assertEqual(type(A), B). The correct way is to use assertIsInstance(A,
    B) provided by testtools.
    Closes-bug: #1268480
    
    Change-Id: I4fa05ff742bf690b4ffa9fd8f24ffcff0645d645

commit d2a1d6fcb7e746a5340db0990a8f5d0fc786738d
Author: lzklibj <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jan 6 11:27:34 2016 +0800

    Unify using assertIsInstance
    
    Use assertIsInstance(A, B) to replace assertTrue(isinstance(A, B)).
    
    Prefer specific assertions such as assert(Not)IsInstance over generic ones
    (assertTrue/False, assertEqual) because they raise more meaningful errors.
    
    Change-Id: I56278b1a74108e2765a8a740658f33954f5404c7
    Closes-bug: #1268480
